channel.title: My Goals and Achievements
channel.description:
My Goals and Achievements for the next two weeks to get 90 in Construction & 99 Prayer. Then for the rest of the year it is to max out combat by doing slayer, and get all my skills to 85 or higher. I will also be getting 99 Dungeoneering.
I'll be posting an update picture three times a week, one on Monday, one on Wednesday, and Friday to show you my progress. I will also include a picture of my current slayer tab.
[b]Note:[/b] If you want to play In-Game together to Skill, Slay, Quest, or Boss private message me on here for my username.
[b]1-4-2013[/b] Skills: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/sl68gj.png[/img]
Slayer Tab: [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/21nqnpe.png[/img]
[b]5-4-2013[/b] Skills: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/bgvkut.png[/img]
Slayer Tab: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28pjzd.png[/img]
[b]7-4-2013[/b] Skills: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nqglxt.png[/img]
Slayer Tab: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/hrwpb7.png[/img]

Thanks all, updated again.

item.title: My Goals and Achievements
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Nice, I wish I had your account (lol).
Time to play some more RuneScape I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: My Goals and Achievements
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:2, topic:512924”]Your 11 levels away from getting your goals for the next two months in which it will only take you a few weeks to achieve.

I’m wondering What you’ll do for the other month and a half…

Nether the less, Good luck I suppose.[/quote]
If I do achieve them before, I will be starting my Combat goals.

Update: 80 Slayer has been achieved. Started on Construction (I will get it today), then I’ll be starting gathering more charms.

Read full topic
